text: The Biathlon World Championships 2020 took place in Rasen-Antholz, Italy, from 12 to 23 February 2020. ==Host selection== On 4 September 2016, Antholz- Anterselva won the voting (30 votes) during the twelfth IBU Congress in Chisinau over Pokljuka (15 votes) and Oberhof, Germany (four votes). Also Nové Město na Moravě withdrew their bid for 2020 before the vote took place. The 2020 event is staged in Antholz for the sixth time. ==Schedule== All times are local (UTC+1). {| class="wikitable" |- ! Date ! Time !
